alert.note: Alert for Colorado (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 02 at 1:02AM CST until January 02 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...SUNDAY NIGHT`S FREEZE WATCH IS CANCELLED FOR COLORADO COUNTY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees are expected. * WHERE...Colorado County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
